html: The endowment of Jehovah’s people with his holy Spirit (Isaiah 32:15; 44:3) forms that part of Jehovah’s millennial covenant that resembles his covenant with the Levites (2 Chronicles 35:2-3; Nehemiah 8:9). As the priests and Levites served as teachers to Jehovah’s peoples, so his servants serve as priests and teachers to the nations (Isaiah 61:6; 66:19-21). Because the terms covenant and mouth additionally designate Jehovah’s servant (Isaiah 42:6; 49:2, 8; 51:16; 55:3), the servant’s millennial ministry, as characterized by Jehovah’s Spirit (Isaiah 11:1-9; 42:1-4; 48:14-17; 61:1-6), continues generationally.
